page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS-THE ELDERLY
page.content: In line with national trends the number of pensioners is on the increase. {HOUSING:}There is no specific housing available apart from 2 private residential homes (National Health assisted) in {Coleby}for 12 persons and at{Harmston}for 8. {HOME HELPS}are available,payment means tested. {MEALS-ON-WHEELS,}organised by the WRVS, costing 74p each are delivered, twice weekly, by volunteers. {A FRIENDSHIP CLUB }meets fortnightly in each village. {CHIROPODY:}Every 6 weeks a mobile clinic parks at{Coleby. {LIBRARY: }Large print books are available bi_weekly from the mobile library.
